subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: While Jack Roush was in the Mayo Clinic for injuries sustained in a plane crash, his driver Greg Biffle ended a 64-race Sprint Cup winless streak.
snippet: While Jack Roush was in the Mayo Clinic for injuries sustained in a plane crash, his driver Greg Biffle ended a 64-race Sprint Cup winless streak.
